name: Knight Path - Game Jam edition
description:
You are The Knight Who must Get The Gold Coin.  

Your goal is to go to the last level with Boss and defeat him.

This game was made in 3 days for the week long Kindred Game Jam #6.

The theme was: "At the beginning there was nothing"

So you have to buy platforms to pass the level.

How To Play:

When you kill an enemy, Coin falls out of it and you can buy a platform for it. The brown platform is normal and the blue increases JumpForce. When you buy it, you can put it where you want by pulling it.

Background  music by AIVA.ai.
